brand.name: famli
brand.tagline: Store what matters, at your pace.

hero.title: Organize memories, documents, and guidance
hero.titleEnd: â€” securely and at your own pace.
hero.subtitle: Pass on what matters to the right people, when the time comes. No rush, no hassle, with full control over who sees what.
hero.trustBadge: ðŸ”’ Your data is handled with care

differentiator.title: Different from everything else
differentiator.subtitle: It's not a digital vault. It's not a will. It's a space to organize and pass on context â€” while you still can.
differentiator.point3: Choose who sees what, and when

card.title: Your care in one place
card.item3: Memories and messages for those you love

senior.title: For those 50+
senior.description: Want to keep everything organized, calmly, without depending on memory.

family.title: For families
family.description: Who don't want to leave anyone in the dark in case of emergency.

caregiver.title: For caregivers
caregiver.description: Children, grandchildren, and trusted people who need to know where to find what's important.

features.title: What you can store
features.subtitle: Everything someone would need to know if you couldn't explain.

info.title: Important information
info.description: Health plans, insurance, accounts, emergency contacts â€” all in one place, with clear instructions.

people.title: Trusted people
people.description: Register who can help if you need it. You decide what each person can see.

access.title: Access instructions
access.description: Explain where your passwords are and how to access them â€” without storing the passwords here. Safe and practical.

memories.title: Memories and messages
memories.description: A special space to leave messages, stories, and memories for those you love.

security.title: Built with security and privacy
security.subtitle: We understand you're storing sensitive information. That's why security isn't optional â€” it's fundamental.
security.item3: You can delete everything whenever you want
security.item4: We don't sell your data to anyone
security.note: Adding someone as a trusted person {bold} gives automatic access to your information.

trust.title: Why trust Famli?
trust.subtitle: We know that storing important information requires trust. Here's how we protect you:

encryption.title: Top-tier encryption
encryption.description: Your data is encrypted with AES-256, a widely used standard.

control.title: You're in total control
control.description: You decide who sees what. Nothing is shared without your explicit permission.

privacy.title: Privacy first
privacy.description: We don't sell your data or use it for marketing. Sharing only happens when you decide.

delete.title: Delete anytime
delete.description: Your data is yours. You can export or delete everything at any time.

lgpd.title: Privacy aligned with LGPD/GDPR principles
lgpd.description: We aim to follow LGPD/GDPR principles and data protection best practices.

opensource.title: Transparency
opensource.description: Open source for transparency. It enables independent review, but it is not a guarantee of security.

cta.title: Start organizing what matters today
cta.subtitle: It takes less than 5 minutes to take the first step. No complications.

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your Famli Box
auth.registerSubtitle: It's simple and takes less than 1 minute
auth.name: Your name
auth.namePlaceholder: What would you like to be called?
auth.emailHint: Use an email you check frequently
auth.passwordInvalid: Complete the password requirements above to continue
auth.securityNote: We handle your data with care, and you decide who can see it.
auth.socialLoginError: Error signing in. Please try again.

errors.invalidData: Please fill in all fields correctly.
errors.weakPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters with letters and numbers.

errors.sessionNotFound: Session not found. Please sign in.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

errors.connectionError: Connection error. Check your internet and try again.
errors.registerFailed: Could not create your account. Please try again.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

dashboard.welcome: You've organized {count} items in your Famli Box.

box.title: Your Famli Box
box.subtitle: Everything you've stored, in one place.
box.empty: Your box is empty. Start by storing something important above!
box.endOfList: You've reached the end of the list

composer.title: What would you like to store today?
composer.subtitle: Choose a type and fill it out at your pace. You can edit later.

info.hint: Use this space to store important information, instructions, and guidance.
info.titlePlaceholder: E.g.: Health plan, car keys, bank account...
info.detailsPlaceholder: Describe where it is, how to access it, who to contact...

guardian.hint: Trusted people are family members or friends you want close and can share information with when needed.
guardian.pinHint: The PIN is required to allow access via link.

memory.hint: A special space to leave messages, stories, and notes for those you love.
memory.titlePlaceholder: E.g.: Message for my children, An important story...
memory.recipientPlaceholder: E.g.: My children, Maria, The whole family...

composer.shareHint: Adding a trusted person does not grant automatic access to your information

guardian.linkCopied: Link copied! Send it to this person so they can access the shared information.
guardian.pinRequired: Set a PIN for this person before sharing the link.

share.pinRequiredBody: To generate a secure link, you need to set a PIN for this person.
share.pinRequiredTip: Edit the trusted person and set a PIN before sharing.
share.linkCopiedBody: Share the link and send the PIN through a separate channel.
share.tipSeparatePin: Send the PIN separately (e.g., SMS or a phone call).
share.tipVerifyRecipient: Confirm you're sending it to the right person.
share.tipRevoke: If the link leaks, remove the guardian to invalidate it.
share.copyErrorBody: Try again or copy it manually.

guide.title: Famli Guide
guide.subtitle: Follow the cards below at your own pace. You don't need to do everything at once â€” fill them out gradually, when you feel comfortable.

welcome.title: Start here
welcome.description: Take the first step: register something simple, like an emergency phone number or an important contact.

people.title: Important people
people.description: Who do you want close if you ever need help? Register your trusted contacts here.

locations.title: Where important things are
locations.description: Documents, keys, cards... Explain where the things someone would need to find are.

routines.title: Routines that can't stop
routines.description: Medications, automatic payments, pets... What needs to keep working even if you're not around?

access.title: How to access your things
access.description: Explain where your passwords are (not the passwords themselves!) and how a trusted person can help access them.

memories.title: Personal notes and memories
memories.description: Messages, stories, notes... A space to leave something special for those you love.

assistant.title: Famli Assistant
assistant.intro: Talk to me like you would talk to someone close. I can help you decide what to store and how to organize it.
assistant.placeholder: E.g.: I want to save my cardiologist's phone number. How do I do it?

emergency.title: Emergency protocol
emergency.description: In the future, your trusted people may be notified if you haven't accessed your account for a long time. For now, this is just an initial setting.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Receive gentle reminders to continue organizing your Famli Box.

privacy.title: Transparency and Privacy
privacy.subtitle: Your data is yours. Here we explain how we take care of it.

whatWeDo.title: What we do with your data
whatWeDo.item1: We use your information to operate the service and improve your experience on Famli
whatWeDo.item2: Your data is stored with security measures
whatWeDo.item3: By default, only you see what's in your Famli Box. You can share when you want

whatWeDont.title: What we DON'T do
whatWeDont.item1: We don't sell your data to third parties
whatWeDont.item2: We don't use your information for marketing
whatWeDont.item3: We don't share automatically with anyone

guardians.title: About trusted people
guardians.text1: Adding someone as a trusted person {bold} gives automatic access to your information. In the MVP, they let you register people you can share information with via links when you want.
guardians.text2: In future versions, you'll be able to choose in more detail: what information to share, with whom, and in what situations.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.item1: You can see everything you've stored at any time
rights.item2: You can manage your information and delete what you want
rights.item3: You can delete your account and all data whenever you want
rights.item4: We follow data protection principles and applicable laws

tip.title: Tip
tip.text: Start with the most important: register a trusted person's contact.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.text: Your data is yours. You decide what to store and who can see it.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.

confirmations.deleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
confirmations.deleteGuardian: Are you sure you want to remove this person?
confirmations.logout: Are you sure you want to sign out?
confirmations.deleteItemMessage: This action cannot be undone. The item will be permanently removed.
confirmations.deleteGuardianMessage: This person will be removed from your trusted list.

edit.title: Edit item
edit.guardianNote: Editing trusted people will be available soon. For now, you can remove and add again.

password.forgot_subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
password.link_expired_subtitle: This reset link has expired or has already been used.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.accessDenied: You don't have permission to access this area. Please check if your email is in the ADMIN_EMAILS list.
admin.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
admin.loadError: Error loading data. Please try again.

system.noAdminEmails: No emails configured (all users have access in development)

profile.title: My Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.securityNote: We take care of your data. You can access this page at any time to check your account information.
profile.exportError: Error exporting data. Please try again.
profile.deleteError: Error deleting account. Check your password and try again.

lgpd.title: Your Rights (Data Protection)
lgpd.description: Under data protection laws, you have the right to data portability and deletion. Use the options below to exercise these rights.
lgpd.exportDescription: Download a copy of all your data stored in Famli in JSON format.
lgpd.deleteDescription: Permanently remove your account and all associated data. This action is irreversible.
lgpd.deleteWarning1: By deleting your account, you will lose access to:
lgpd.deleteWarning2: This action is permanent and cannot be undone!
lgpd.confirmationLabel: Type the text below to confirm:

legal.termsAndPrivacy: By creating your account, you agree to the

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using Famli, you agree to these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the service.

service.title: Service Description
service.text: Famli is a digital platform designed to help you organize important information, personal guidance, and memories, allowing you to choose who can access them. Famli is not a legal, medical, financial, or professional advisory service and does not replace professionals in these areas.

account.title: Your Account
account.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. Please notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use. Do not share your credentials with third parties.

content.title: Your Content
content.text: You retain all rights to the content you add to Famli. By using the service, you grant us a limited, non-exclusive, and royalty-free license to store, process, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing the service. Famli does not use, sell, or share your content for commercial purposes.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Use
prohibited.text: You may not use Famli for:

termination.title: Termination
termination.text: We may suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms. You may close your account at any time through the service settings.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.text: Famli is provided "as is". We do not guarantee uninterrupted availability or error-free operation. You are solely responsible for the content you store and for any decisions made based on the information recorded on the platform. Under no circumstances shall Famli be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.text: We may update these Terms of Use from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via email or through the service.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, please contact us:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.text: Your privacy is fundamental to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information on Famli.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.accountDesc: Email, name, and hashed password for authentication.
dataCollected.contentDesc: Information, memories, and trusted people you add.
dataCollected.usageDesc: Usage events and pages visited to understand how the service is used.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.item1: Provide and maintain the Famli service
dataUse.item3: Improve the service based on usage metrics and submitted feedback

security.title: Data Security
security.text: We implement robust security measures to protect your data:
security.item1: AES-256-GCM encryption for stored sensitive data

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.text: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes. We may share data only when required by law.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You have the following rights over your data:
rights.item1: Access all information we store about you
rights.item2: Request corrections or updates to your data
rights.item3: Request complete deletion of your account and data
rights.item4: Export your data in a portable format

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.text: We use essential cookies only to keep your login session active. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through the service.

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.messagePlaceholder: Tell us what you think about Famli...
feedback.successMessage: Thank you for your feedback! Your opinion is very important to us.

share.title: Share Links
share.description: Create links to share your information with trusted people when you want.
share.empty: You haven't created any share links yet.
share.categories_hint: Leave empty to allow all categories
share.guardians_hint: Leave empty to create a generic link
share.no_guardians: You haven't added any trusted people yet
share.pin_hint: Add a PIN for extra security
share.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this link?

shared.protected_message: This content is protected by PIN.

apiErrors.title_too_long: Title must be at most 100 characters.
apiErrors.content_too_long: Content must be at most 2000 characters.
apiErrors.name_too_long: Name must be at most 100 characters.
apiErrors.email_too_long: Email must be at most 254 characters.
apiErrors.phone_too_long: Phone must be at most 20 characters.
apiErrors.pin_too_short: PIN must be at least 4 characters.
apiErrors.pin_too_long: PIN must be at most 20 characters.
apiErrors.recipient_too_long: Recipient must be at most 100 characters.
apiErrors.duplicate_guardian_email: A trusted person with this email already exists.
apiErrors.unauthorized: You don't have permission to perform this action.
apiErrors.rate_limit: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
apiErrors.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.
apiErrors.network_error: Connection error. Check your internet and try again.
apiErrors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
